name: Gentle Glow
description: Experience the ultimate purity with Gentle Glow Cleanser. Designed purely for sensitive skin, this formula removes impurities without stripping moisture.

name: Herbal Fresh
description: Revitalize your skin with the power of nature using Herbal Fresh Cleanser. Infused with Neem and Tea Tree Oil, it actively fights acne-causing bacteria.

name: Deep Purify
description: Achieve a deep, professional-grade clean with Deep Purify Cleanser. Activated Charcoal draws out toxins and pollutants from deep within.

name: Aqua Balance
description: Restore hydration while you cleanse with Aqua Balance. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to lock in moisture instantly.

name: Soothing Aloe
description: Calm and comfort your skin with our Soothing Aloe Cleanser. Pure Aloe Vera extract reduces redness and inflammation on contact.

name: Bee Factor
description: Harness the healing power of Propolis and Honey with Bee Factor. Naturally antibacterial, it promotes skin healing.

name: Carrot Face Wash
description: Reveal brighter skin with nutrient-rich Carrot Face Wash. Packed with Beta-Carotene and Vitamin A to promote cell turnover.

name: Papaya Face Wash
description: Exfoliate naturally with the enzymatic power of Papaya Face Wash. Papain enzymes gently dissolve dead skin cells.

name: O’Nelle Face Wash
description: Experience the luxury of O’Nelle Face Wash for ageless beauty. Enriched with botanical extracts that firm and tighten.

name: Coconut Face Wash
description: Hydrate and soften with the tropical goodness of Coconut Face Wash. Coconut water extracts provide deep hydration.

name: Strawberry Face Wash
description: Sweeten your skincare routine with Strawberry Face Wash. Natural fruit acids (AHAs) gently exfoliate.

name: Spa Ceylon Face Wash
description: Indulge in holistic Ayurveda with Spa Ceylon Face Wash. Purifies the skin while calming the mind and senses.

name: Vanicream
description: Dermatologist-recommended Vanicream for sensitive skin care. Free from dyes, fragrance, lanolin, and parabens.

name: Neutrogena
description: Lightweight hydration meets power with Neutrogena Hydro Boost. Gel-cream formula absorbs instantly.

name: Biotherm
description: Regenerate your skin with the aquatic power of Biotherm. Infused with Life Plankton™ to heal and renew.

name: Face Reality
description: Clarify and hydrate with Face Reality ClearaSkin Moisturizer. Specially formulated for acne-prone skin.

name: Vitamin Boost
description: Energize dull skin with our Vitamin Boost Moisturizer. Loaded with Vitamins C, E, and B5.

name: Nivea Soft
description: Experience the classic softness of Nivea Soft. Enriched with Jojoba Oil and Eucerit for deep nourishment.

name: Carrot Serum
description: Concentrated brightness with our intensive Carrot Serum. Potent Beta-Carotene oil penetrates deep.

name: Papaya Serum
description: Unveil glass-like skin with our Papaya Brightening Serum. Targets dark spots and uneven tone actively.

name: O'Nelle Serum
description: The gold standard of anti-aging: O'Nelle Ageless Serum. Formulated with peptides to firm skin.

name: Coconut Serum
description: Deep nourishment in a bottle: Coconut Hydration Serum. Rich in fatty acids to repair a damaged barrier.

name: Strawberry Serum
description: Pore-refining perfection with Strawberry Clarifying Serum. Salicylic Acid unclogs and shrinks pores.

name: Spa Ceylon Serum
description: Royal Ayurvedic care with Spa Ceylon Precious Serum. Infused with saffron and sandalwood.

name: SunShield SPF 50
description: Maximum protection with SunShield SPF 50 Broad Spectrum. Non-greasy finish.

name: Golden Glow SPF 30
description: Protect and bronze with Golden Glow SPF 30 Tinted Sunscreen. Evens out skin tone instantly.

name: AquaGuard SPF 45
description: Hydrating sun care with AquaGuard SPF 45 Gel. Water-based weightless formula.

name: Herbal Defense SPF 40
description: Natural sun safety with Herbal Defense. Mineral-based blocker using Zinc Oxide.

name: Tropical Sun SPF 35
description: Enjoy the sun responsibly with Tropical Sun. Infused with Coconut Oil for a tan-enhancing effect.

name: Daily Protect SPF 25
description: Everyday urban defense. Protects against blue light from screens and UV rays.

name: Binara
description: Wrap your body in floral elegance with Binara Body Lotion. Scented with the rare Binara flower.

name: Kasthurikaha
description: Brighten your body with Wild Turmeric Lotion. Traditional Ayurvedic formula for glowing skin.

name: Fern
description: Refresh your senses with the crisp scent of Fern. Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula.

name: Red Sandalwood
description: Luxurious calm with Red Sandalwood. Sandalwood oil soothes inflammation.

name: Dlas
description: Experience the purity of nature with Dlas Herbal Lotion. Blend of five essential herbs.

name: Lotus
description: Hydrate divinely with the essence of Blue Lotus. Rich in natural antioxidants.

name: Refreshing Mint Gel
description: Wake up your body with Refreshing Mint. Cooling menthol sensation jumpstarts your morning.

name: Citrus Blast Gel
description: Zest up your life with Citrus Blast. Vitamin C brightens body skin.

name: Aloe Vera Gel
description: Sooth and cleanse with gentle Aloe Vera. Soap-free formula respects the skin's natural pH.

name: Ocean Breeze Gel
description: Dive into freshness with Ocean Breeze. Marine minerals detoxify and remineralize.

name: Lavender Calm Gel
description: Unwind deeply with Lavender Calm. Natural Lavender oil promotes relaxation and sleep.

name: Tropical Paradise Gel
description: Escape to an island with Tropical Paradise. Blend of Mango and Papaya scents.

name: Sugar Glow
description: Polish your skin to perfection with Sugar Glow Scrub. Natural sugar crystals buff away dead cells.

name: Coffee Revive
description: Banish cellulite with Coffee Revive Scrub. Ground Robusta beans stimulate blood flow.

name: Coconut Smooth
description: Creamy exfoliation with Coconut Smooth. Shredded coconut and oil hydrate while scrubbing.

name: Sea Salt Scrub
description: Detoxify vigorously with mineral-rich Sea Salt Scrub. Coarse salt granules provide deep exfoliation.

name: Lavender Calm
description: Relax and refine with Lavender Calm Body Scrub. Polishes skin gently while soothing.

name: Rose Bliss
description: Romance your skin with Rose Bliss Body Scrub. Crushed rose petals and oils soften skin.

name: SunShield Body SPF 50
description: Full body armor: SunShield SPF 50. High-performance protection for outdoors.

name: Golden Glow Body SPF 30
description: Glow while you protect with Golden Glow. Shimmering particles enhance your tan.

name: AquaGuard Body SPF 45
description: Sport-ready protection: AquaGuard SPF 45 Body Spray. Quick-dry spray application.

name: Herbal Defense Body SPF 40
description: Nature's shield for your body. Biodegradable formula safe for coral reefs.

name: Tropical Sun Body SPF 35
description: Scent of summer: Tropical Sun. Rich Coconut and Shea Butter moisturize deeply.

name: Daily Protect Body SPF 25
description: Everyday body care: Daily Protect SPF 25. Light enough for daily wear under clothes.

name: Fresh Breeze
description: Stay confident with Fresh Breeze. 24-hour odor protection with a crisp scent.

name: Cool Mist
description: Feel the chill with Cool Mist. Advanced sweat-control technology keeps you dry.

name: Herbal Shield
description: Natural odor defense. Uses Sage and Tea Tree to neutralize bacteria naturally.

name: Active Guard
description: Built for performance: Active Guard Sport. Motion-activated fragrance capsules.

name: Tropical Fresh
description: Island freshness: Tropical Fresh Roll-On. Scented with exotic fruits and florals.

name: Daily Comfort
description: Gentle and effective Daily Comfort Stick. Creamy formula glides on smooth.
